roleset.name: to last or experience for a long time

role.descr: experiencer, thing continuing to live beyond its time
point of comparison, entity that arg1 is living beyond

example.name: Transitive
example.text: Is it an example of "existing infrastructure" that is worn out and outlived its usefulness?

roleset.note: OUTLIVE-V NOTES: Framed by Claire based on survey of sentences in Webtext 2.5-2. No VerbNet entry. Comparison to 'endure' and 'survive.' (from outlive.01-v)
